summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from Seventh Avenue South to Sixth Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, by constructing a bridge on each side of the street sixteen (16) feet in width with walks twelve (12) feet in width from the property line, in accordance with Resolution No. 1318 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
